channel.title: +1 Forward - FitD Series - Scum & Villainy
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/july-12th-2021
Rach and Rich continue their second Summer Series. This series covers games in the Forged in the Dark (FitD) style of PbtA games. This second episode features John Leboeuf-Little and Stras Acimovic, creators of the *Scum & Villainy* RPG.
Timecodes: 00:02:32 - **Setting Position and Effect** - covering the discussion of the fiction in FitD games, and also the non-finality of moves 00:15:51 - **Progress Clock** on *Scum & Villainy* 00:27:37 - **The Score** - a *Scum & Villainy* chase sequence
You can find *Scum & Villainy* at Evil Hat's store: https://www.evilhat.com/home/scum-and-villainy/
Stras is on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/strasa John is on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/worldnamer Their official website is here: https://offguardgames.com/
